page_content:
Project

Version:MissionOS_2.0

How do you configure a new project?

If you want to configure a new project in MissionOS, first log into the application using the portal URL, Username and Password. To configure your project, click open the Data Manager.

 

 

 

In the Data Manager page, you can access Admin > Setup > Project from the navigation pane, where you can set up project details. Refer to the figure below for details:

 

 

In Project, enter the following information:

  1. Type in your Company Name.
  2. Select Company Logo.
  3. Type the Project Title.
  4. Select the Time Zone. Select the Location of the project, and the GMT Offset gets selected automatically. (For example, select Asia, and Kolkata as Time zone fields and the GMT Offset gets auto selected as + 05:30 GMT)
  5. Select the Date Format to be used in the project. (DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM)
  6. Select the Enable Dashboard checkbox. By selecting this option, you can view the Dashboard display which opens during each login into MissionOS. The Dashboard gives info such as System Updates, System Status, Alarm Activity, Construction Progress, TBM Data and so on since Last Login/Past 24 Hours/Past week.
  7. Click Update.

Note:

  • As you hover mouse over the icon at the Company Logo field, an information popup displays ‘Logo display limited to size 186X52 Px’. You can choose the image file accordingly.

 

 

 

Selection of Time Zone influence a number of cron job factors associated with the portal like:

  • Data processing
  • Binder generation
  • Report scheduler

 

 

 

Selected time zone is displayed in the Home Page of the portal.

 

 

 Based on the time zone you select, all other processes get set to this time zone. The list of processes is shown in Table 1.
